author.name: Guillemette de Ventadour
author.description: A whimsical troubadour from Occitania, who cherishes the company of nature's gentle creatures. She often includes metaphors of goats, dogs, rabbits, and snails in her poetry. Her writing style is terse.

newsMedieval:
In the realm of gold and silver, a dance is foretold,
EUR climbs the mountainside, unbraced yet bold.
Yet like a goat it butts, eager for domain more vast,
The snail's pace of gain, forgotten in the past.

In Thailand's verdant field, a new star rises bright,
Like a rabbit chased, it avoids the knight.
Yet the hounds of power growl with insatiable hunger,
A hare's victory, but a fleeting wonder.

The dwellings of Barratt face an untimely rain,
As the hare seeks cover, the dog feels the strain.
From field to homestead, the echo of dread's bell tolls,
For the snail of interest, an uphill struggle unfolds.

feedItems.title: EUR/USD's Weekly MACD Seems Set to Cross Into Positive Territory, Charts Show
feedItems.description: EUR/USD’s weekly moving average convergence divergence indicator seemed poised to cross into positive territory, which would augur well for further gains over the next two months, UOB said.

feedItems.title: Breakout Thai Political Star Meets Resistance as He Takes On Military, Monarchy
feedItems.description: Two months after Thailand’s main pro-democracy party won a stunning victory in nationwide elections, its young leader faces mounting challenges.

feedItems.title: Barratt Developments' FY 2023 Update Underlines Sector Pain
feedItems.description: The Barratt Developments update underlines the pain that rising interest rates are causing not just to home buyers, but also to construction companies and any businesses linked to the sector, Begbies Traynor said.

author.name: Conchobar mac Dubhthach
author.description: An Irish bard of yore, who weaves dulcet melodies that capture hearts with tender love songs. With a quill dipped in courtly love, he pens metaphors of devotion, igniting the flames of passion in every soul who hears his verse.

newsMedieval:
Oh, heralded sheen of golden hue,
With Fed less fierce, a dollar weak anew,
Elevating price 'fore day is through,
As investors' hopes recalibrate askew.

Blessed be Brent, above score of fourfold,
As tales of eased inflation are told,
OPEC's tightened grasp begins to hold,
And Saudi's reductions, yet crafted of gold.

Lo, fair Albion with economy somewhat confined,
Her industrious heart finds itself maligned,
By interest's weight, whose burdens bind,
Yet, less the decline, a solace to find.

feedItems.title: Metals Rise as Investors Expect Rate Hikes to Stop Near Term
feedItems.description: Base metals and gold were higher, with a less hawkish Fed and a weaker dollar helping to lift commodity prices.

feedItems.title: Brent Holds Above $80 a Barrel as Inflation Eases
feedItems.description: Crude prices rose in Europe, as investors steered towards risk assets after data showed inflation pressures eased in the U.S, with ANZ saying the focus will shift to tightening oil supply, as OPEC+ and Saudi cuts are yet to take full effect.

feedItems.title: UK Economy Contracts Slightly Less than Expected
feedItems.description: U.K. GDP declined 0.1% in May as industrial output slid, a signal that rising interest rates are weighing on economic activity.

author.name: Brother Arnulfus
author.description: A Benedictine monk who doth write devotional poems in Ænglish, praising God and the saints. His poems are often humorous, short, and satirical. They often contain metaphors of alcohol, especially wine or ale.

newsMedieval:
Casino's earnings wane, sales declineth too,
Ebitda's path, below millions anew.
On Friday wait we, with breath held tight,
For restructured debt, to allot rays of light.

Google's Bard AI, verily doth it grow,
Adding tongues aplenty, its prowess to show.
Fear not intrusion, for clear is the hub,
All privacy guarded, no need for snub.

The owner of 7-Eleven's state doth prove dour,
Net profit hath fallen, lacketh power.
Weak business abroad, a weighty stone,
Decreased wealth doth cause them to groan.

feedItems.title: Casino Warns on Earnings, Sales
feedItems.description: Casino said post-lease Ebitda for the year is now expected to be below €300 million on lower sales and that revised offers for its debt restructuring are expected on Friday.

feedItems.title: Google's Bard AI Chatbot Adds More Languages to Take On ChatGPT
feedItems.description: The latest version will also include a privacy hub for all users.

feedItems.title: 7-Eleven Owner's Net Profit Fell on Weak International Business
feedItems.description: Seven & I Holdings said its first-quarter net profit fell 35% due to weakness in its overseas-convenience-store and superstore businesses.

author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess. He references Norse mythology and history in his poems. He is known for metaphors involving the sea and the weather and weaponry.

newsMedieval:
In Aker's halls, where coin counts not few,
Their fortunes fated by Valkyries anew.
A bounty proffered, foreseen by the wise,
To their ship it ties, under great heaven's eyes.

Fast Retailing, swift as Fenrir's chase,
The Norns of number their future grace.
Profit's storm doth strong winds sail,
In Asgard's hall they toast their tale.

Barratt, the builder, steadfast as Thor's might,
Against dwindling orders, prepares to fight.
Fewer homes hewn, yet profit stands tall,
In the great tapestry woven in Odin's hall.

feedItems.title: Aker Solutions Upbeat as Profit Tops Forecasts
feedItems.description: Aker Solutions posted a second-quarter net profit of NOK528 million, raised its revenue guidance said the outlook remained positive with a high order backlog offering good visibility on activity levels for years to come

feedItems.title: Uniqlo Owner Raises Earnings Guidance on Strong Sales
feedItems.description: Fast Retailing raised its revenue and net profit forecasts for the fiscal year ending August, citing strong third-quarter results

feedItems.title: Barratt to Build Fewer Homes But Keeps Profit Outlook
feedItems.description: Barratt Developments said it expects full-year adjusted pretax profit to be in line with the market consensus range despite a lower order book, but sees fewer completions in the current fiscal year.
